column3: Another adventurer come to help the Resistance, you say? Well, if you've a need for arms and armor, you may be in luck.
You may submit certain craftable items for Disciples of War and Magic to receive a commensurate number of tokens.
These tokens can then be exchanged for gear of your choosing with a higher item level.
Welcome, traveler. If you should happen to find yourself laden with unwanted wares, might you be willing to donate them? Rest assured, you will be well compensated for your contribution.
You may submit certain craftable items for Disciples of War and Magic to receive a commensurate number of tokens.
These tokens can then be exchanged for gear of your choosing with a higher item level.
Well met, adventurer! Looking to trade? If you're keen to part with unneeded wares, I'll make it worth your while.
You may submit certain craftable items for Disciples of War and Magic to receive a commensurate number of tokens.
These tokens can then be exchanged for gear of your choosing with a higher item level.
I'm afraid we're not open for business just yet. But when we are, we hope that you'll favor us with your custom!
Greetings, friend! If you have gear you no longer require, we'd be glad to take them off your hands. You'll be suitably compensated, of course!
You may submit certain craftable items for Disciples of War and Magic to receive a commensurate number of tokens.
These tokens can then be exchanged for gear of your choosing with a higher item level.
